message.body: Hey. Your paintings are great! Are they for sale?

Hi! Of course! There is a price list. Also, I will be having another reception at the Crane and they will hang there for a month too. I'm willing to negotiate the prices for friends too, and certainly willing to accept small monthly payments too. How are Your shows going?? My roommate just applied to mambo btw and he's totally great! You'd love him.
If you end up working w him, tell him I said hi!
I bet people apply to mambo all the time tho so I doubt he'll get called

He's pretty great at doing the dishes and being a responsible and thoughtful roommate, so I'm pretty sure he'd be a good coworker. I should totally make him move my furniture as practice haha to 'help' him

Cool! I didn't see the price list. I'll check it out next time I am there. I just got back from tour so I'm not sure if Avery is working. I'm playing a record release show at 1026 on Wednesday the 10th. You should try to come!
Sticking it in my calendar now
Also let me know if you ever want to grab a drink or something!
